titles.title: ACES Act
Accountability for Cryptocurrency in El Salvador Act
ACES Act
A bill to require reports on the adoption of cryptocurrency as legal tender in El Salvador.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
Accountability for Cryptocurrency in El Salvador Act or the ACES Act
This bill requires the Department of State and the Department of the Treasury to report to Congress on various issues relating to the adoption by El Salvador of a cryptocurrency as legal tender.
